alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Franklin (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 4:42PM EDT until July 09 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Clinton County in northern New York... Northeastern Franklin County in northern New York... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 442 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Merrill, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Churubusco, Ellenburg Depot, Merrill, Bryants Mill, Chateaugay, Lyon Mountain, Ellenburg, Earlville, Alder Bend, Ellenburg Mountain, Miner Lake State Park, Harrigan, Ellenburg Center, Owls Head, Chasm Falls, Standish, Brainardsville, and Wolf Pond. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
